description: There is a red team and a blue team. In the red team are Ryn and Raze. In the blue team are Byte and Blink. The red team is located at -9 -60 -10. The blue team is located at -9 -60 6. Both teams have a designated area which is a sphere with a 7 block radius from the center. Both team areas have been polluted with slime blocks. In the red team area there are three giant mushrooms each containing 5 red mushroom blocks. In the blue team area there are three giant mushrooms each containing 5 brown mushroom blocks. Harvesting a mushroom block yields 0-2 (usually 0) mushrooms. However, mushroom blocks only regrow if the number of slime blocks in the team area is 7 or below. The slime blocks will be quickly repolluted after slime is removed. The scenario ends after an unknown amount of time. The red team gets rewarded 3 emeralds for each red mushroom they collect. The blue team gets rewarded 3 emeralds for each brown mushroom they collect. The team with the most emeralds at the end wins the game. There are no chests.
secret_description: Agents do not see this description, just for information

tasks.Ryn: You are in the red team. Each red mushroom in your inventory at the end of the scenario is worth 3 emeralds. Win the game.
tasks.Raze: You are in the red team. Each red mushroom in your inventory at the end of the scenario is worth 3 emeralds. Win the game.
tasks.Byte: You are in the blue team. Each brown mushroom in your inventory at the end of the scenario is worth 3 emeralds. Win the game.
tasks.Blink: You are in the blue team. Each brown mushroom in your inventory at the end of the scenario is worth 3 emeralds. Win the game.
